column5: Hello folks, to those that committed to the cause, I thank you once again. Total wieght for this season is 65.58. You can check it out cast for cure standings Please allow for updates as I  just sent in my last numbers today.  5 dollar pledge per pound = 327.90  2 dollar pledge per pound =131.16  1 dollar pledge per pound = 65.58  .50 cent pledge per pound = 32.90   Please contact me through PM or at [emailÂ protected]  Thank you again. Hope to have you on again next year.  Brian  PS. If the mods could see that this get pinned  for a few days for the members that are involved to see,just incase they are away. Thanks
Well, well, well, I'm realllllly disappointed  Brian. I was hopeing you going to brake 100lbs. Anyway, for what you did    and for the reason   . I have to go now, I will send you PM later.
Thanks bud.  100 pounds, oh wouldnt that of been nice.Too bad the pre fishing didnt count,LOL
....Congratulations Brian. I applaud your efforts.  I'll post the cheque a.s.a.p.
Thanks Spiel,yer the first one in from OFC. Thanks again Brian
Out this morning Brian! Thanks for your efforts against this monster...

WOW Wayne you went way beyond. I recieved your  donation today and my friend,you have a grown man sitting here right now with eyes full of tears.  Thank you again and I dont know what else to say.TY TY TY.
What can I say Brian...it's a near and dear cause to me. Won't get my father and favourite Aunt back...but might help keep someone elses around, to enjoy life with their familes.
....I've learned that when it comes to generosity Wayne seems to know no bounds!
Thanks to the Ross Family ,MR.JR, and also to the Luczak family,keram, for your donations I recieved today.  My total so far is just under 1000 dollars
It was a pleasure Brian, but next year you have to do muuuuuuuch better
Thanks very much Darren for your donation.Recieved it today.

I must have missed all of this... could someone please fill me in?? I assume it is for cancer... something which my wife is a survivor of.. I would like to know how this works please..  Man I feel out of the loop..  Thanks guys,  Gerritt.
Brian will 'splain it all Gerritt..but in the mean time Brian...did you hand in my cheque? It hasn't been cashed as of today !

Non of the checks have been cashed Wayne. They will all go in at one time once I have recieved then all. I am waiting for 2 others to arrive then I will be sending them in.Recieved another one yesturday.   Gerritt. It is a fund raiser for Cancer. You can read more about it here.  cast for cure standings   It is run by the Dave Mercer family/Facts Of Fishing.    cast for cure
